returns._0: The address associated with the username

getFeeBalance().details: Get current USDC fee balance (owner only)

returns._0: The username associated with the address

isValidUsername(string).details: Check if username is valid (alphanumeric and underscores only)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

registerPremiumUsername(string).details: Register a premium username (custom handle) - requires 10 USDC

params.username: The username to register (must be unique and valid)

registerUsernameForAddress(string,addres.details: Register username for a specific address (for factory-created wallets)

params.feePayer: Address that pays the registration fee (can be walletAddress or relayer)

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.newFee: The new premium fee (in USDC, 6 decimals)
The new registration fee (in USDC, 6 decimals)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateUsername(string).details: Update username (only if current username is not premium)
